name: Humbly Enough
effect:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A spiced tofu dish. Sautéed tofu is stir-fried with the sauce until browned and ready to serve. Despite the ordinary ingredients, the resulting dish is particularly mellow and fragrant, a perfect partner for rice. It can be said to be the home cook's dish of choice.

suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A spiced tofu dish. The tofu is far too spicy to enjoy as-is, but if you spend some time rinsing the excess seasoning off, you might be able to stomach it...

normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A spiced tofu dish. Sautéed tofu is stir-fried with the sauce until browned and ready to serve. Despite the ordinary ingredients, the resulting dish is particularly mellow and fragrant, a perfect partner for rice. It can be said to be the home cook's dish of choice.

delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A spiced tofu dish. The fried tofu comes with a rich soybean sauce as its classy chaperone. A single bite proves spicy with a hint of a meaty aroma, flooding your mouth with its mellow fragrance and long-lasting aftertaste.
